<支援装置>的持有上限<@ba.kw>+{cnt}</>且部署费用<@ba.kw: Can hold <@ba.kw>+{cnt}</> additional <Support Devices> and device deployment costs are <@ba.kw>reduced</>
不成为其他角色的治疗目标，每次攻击到敌人后回复自身<@ba.kw>{value}: Can't be healed by other units. Recovers <@ba.kw>{value}</> self HP every time this operator attacks an enemy
Can't be healed by other units. Recovers <@ba.kw>{value}</> self HP every time this operator attacks an enemy (Upgraded after reaching Elite 1)
Can't be healed by other units. Recovers <@ba.kw>{value}</> self HP every time this operator attacks an enemy (Upgraded after reaching Elite 2)
不攻击，持续恢复范围内所有友军<@ba.kw>生命</>（每秒恢复相当于自身攻击: Does not attack but continuously restores the <@ba.kw>HP</> of all allies within range (the HP restored per second is equal to 10% of self ATK). Self is unaffected by <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</>

Does not attack but continuously restores the <@ba.kw>HP</> of all allies within range (the HP restored per second is equal to 10% of self ATK). Self is unaffected by <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</> and ignores <@ba.kw>Deployment Limit</>, but has a long Redeployment Time
不攻击，持续恢复范围内所有友军<@ba.kw>生命</>（每秒相当于自身攻击力<: Does not attack but continuously restores the <@ba.kw>HP</> of all allies within range (the HP restored per second is equal to <@ba.kw>{attack@atk_to_hp_recovery_ratio:0%}</> of self ATK). Self is unaffected by <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</>
不进行攻击，且不受<@ba.kw>部署数量</>限制，但再部署时间极长: Does not attack and ignores the <@ba.kw>Deployment Limit</>, but has a long Redeployment Time
不阻挡敌人时优先<@ba.kw>远程群体</>物理攻击: When not blocking enemies, prioritizes dealing <@ba.kw>ranged AoE</> Physical damage
不阻挡敌人时无法自我回复技力，阻挡敌人时恢复技力回复速度且攻击力+15%，防御力: SP does not recover when not blocking an enemy. When blocking an enemy, gain SP recovery, ATK +15%, and DEF +15%
优先攻击攻击范围内<@ba.kw>防御力最低</>的敌方单位: Prioritizes attacking the enemy with <@ba.kw>lowest DEF</> within range first
优先攻击空中单位，且不受<@ba.kw>部署数量</>限制，但再部署时间极长: Attacks aerial enemies first and ignores <@ba.kw>Deployment Limit</>, but has a long Redeployment Time
再部署时间<@ba.kw>减少</>，可使用远程攻击: Has <@ba.kw>reduced</> Redeployment Time, can use ranged attacks
再部署时间<@ba.kw>减少</>，撤退时不返还<@ba.kw>部署费用</>: Has <@ba.kw>reduced</> Redeployment Time, but <@ba.kw>DP Cost</> is not refunded upon retreating; While deployed, <@ba.kw>3 DP</> are consumed every 3 seconds (automatically retreats without sufficient DP)

Has <@ba.kw>reduced</> Redeployment Time, but <@ba.kw>DP Cost</> is not refunded upon retreating; While deployed, <@ba.kw>2 DP</> are consumed every 3 seconds (automatically retreats without sufficient DP)
击杀敌人后获得1点部署费用，撤退时返还初始部署费用: Obtain 1 DP after this unit defeats an enemy; Refunds the original DP Cost when retreated
击杀敌人后获得<@ba.vup>{cost:0}</>点部署费用，撤退时返还<@: Generates <@ba.vup>{cost:0}</> DP after this unit defeats an enemy; Refunds the <@ba.kw>current</> DP Cost when retreated
受到致命伤时不撤退，切换成<替身>作战（替身阻挡数为0但攻击力<@ba.kw>提: Instead of retreating when defeated, switch to a <Substitute> (Substitute has 0 Block, but ATK is <@ba.kw>increased</>) for 20 seconds before switching back to the original
受到致命伤时不撤退，切换成<替身>作战（替身阻挡数为0但生命值<@ba.kw>提: Instead of retreating when defeated, switch to a <Substitute> (Substitute has 0 Block, but HP is <@ba.kw>increased</>) for 20 seconds before switching back to the original
受到致命伤时不撤退，切换成<替身>作战（替身阻挡数为0），持续20s后自身再次替: Does not retreat upon receiving lethal damage, instead swaps to a <Substitute> (Substitute has 0 Block). Swaps back to the original after 20 seconds
受到致命伤时不撤退，切换成<替身>作战（替身阻挡数为0），持续20秒后自身再次替: Does not retreat upon receiving lethal damage, instead swaps to a <Substitute> (Substitute has 0 Block). Swaps back to the original after 20 seconds
只有阻挡敌人时才能够回复技力: Only restores SP when blocking enemies
召唤物持有上限<@ba.kw>+{cnt}</>，召唤物部署费用<@ba.kw>: Can hold <@ba.kw>+{cnt}</> additional summoned units and summoned unit deployment costs are <@ba.kw>reduced</>
可以使用陷阱来协助作战，但陷阱无法放置于<@ba.kw>敌人已在</>的格子中: Can use traps to assist in combat, but traps cannot be placed <@ba.kw>on tiles already occupied by an enemy</>
可以在攻击范围内选择一次<@ba.kw>战术点</>来召唤援军，自身攻击援军阻挡: This unit can designate one <@ba.kw>Tactical Point</> within attack range to call Reinforcements; ATK is increased to 150% when attacking enemies blocked by Reinforcements
可以攻击到<@ba.kw>较远敌人</>，攻击自身未阻挡的敌人时攻击力提升至12: Can attack enemies <@ba.kw>from range</>; When attacking enemies not blocked by self, increase ATK to 120%
可以攻击到<@ba.kw>较远敌人</>，攻击自身未阻挡的敌人时攻击力提升至<@: Can attack enemies <@ba.kw>from range</>; When attacking enemies not blocked by self, increase ATK to <@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</>
可以进行<@ba.kw>远程攻击</>，但此时攻击力降低至80%: Can launch <@ba.kw>Ranged Attacks</> that deal 80% of normal ATK
可以额外部署在远程位: Can also be deployed on Ranged tiles
同时恢复<@ba.kw>四</>个友方单位的生命: Restores the HP of <@ba.kw>4</> allied units simultaneously
同时恢复三个友方单位的生命: Restores the HP of 3 allies simultaneously
同时攻击阻挡的<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>\\n可以放置于远程位:
Can attack <@ba.kw>all blocked enemies</>
Can be deployed on Ranged Tiles
同时攻击阻挡的<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>\\n可以放置于远程位，并返还该次部:
Simultaneously attacks <@ba.kw>all blocked enemies</>
Can be deployed on ranged tiles, and refunds half the DP cost of this deployment
同时攻击阻挡的<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>，攻击被阻挡的敌人攻击力提升至<@b: Can attack <@ba.kw>all blocked enemies</>. When attacking blocked enemies, increase ATK to <@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</>
同时攻击阻挡的<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>，阻挡2个及以上敌人时自身推力增加一:
Simultaneously attacks <@ba.kw>all blocked enemies</>; When blocking 2 or more enemies, increases shift level by 1
Can be deployed on ranged tiles
周围四格没有友方干员时攻击力<@ba.kw>+{atk:0%}</>: When there are no allied units in the four adjacent tiles, ATK <@ba.kw>+{atk:0%}</>
对攻击范围内<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>造成伤害\\n拥有50%的物理和法术闪:
Deals Damage to <@ba.kw>all targets</> within range
50% chance to dodge Physical and Arts attacks and is less likely to be <@ba.kw>targeted</> by enemies
对攻击范围内<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>造成伤害\\n拥有65%的物理和法术闪:
Deals Damage to <@ba.kw>all targets</> within range
65% chance to dodge Physical and Arts attacks and is less likely to be <@ba.kw>targeted</> by enemies
并对目标造成10％<$ba.weaken>虚弱</>效果，持续2秒: and applies 10％ <$ba.weaken>Weaken</> effect to enemies for 2 seconds
恢复友方单位生命，且不受<@ba.kw>部署数量</>限制，但再部署时间极长: Restores the HP of allies and ignores the <@ba.kw>Deployment Limit</>, but has a long Redeployment Time
恢复友方单位生命，且会在<@ba.kw>3</>个友方单位间跳跃，每次跳跃治疗量: Restores HP of allies, bouncing between <@ba.kw>3</> allies. Healing reduced by 25% per bounce.
恢复友方单位生命，并回复相当于攻击力50%的<@ba.dt.element>元素: Restores the HP of allied units and recovers <@ba.dt.element>Elemental Damage</> by 50% of ATK (can recover <@ba.dt.element>Elemental Damage</> of unhurt allied units)
恢复友方单位生命，并回复相当于攻击力<@ba.kw>{ep_heal_ratio: Restores the HP of allied units and recovers <$ba.dt.element>Elemental Damage</> by <@ba.kw>{ep_heal_ratio:0%}</> of ATK (can recover <$ba.dt.element>Elemental Damage</> of unhurt allied units)
技能发动期间阻挡数变为0: Cannot block enemies during the skill duration
技能发动期间阻挡数变为0，但使身前一名干员阻挡数<@ba.kw>+1</>: Cannot block enemies during the skill duration, but <@ba.kw>+1</> Block count to an operator in front
技能可以使敌人产生<@ba.kw>位移</>\\n可以放置于远程位:
Can <@ba.kw>Shift</> enemies by using skills
Can be deployed on Ranged Tiles
技能可以治疗友方单位: Can heal allies by using skill(s)
技能开启时普通攻击会造成法术伤害: Normal attacks deal Arts damage while the skill is active
拖拽期间敌人受到正比于距离的法术伤害: While being pulled, enemies take Arts damage proportional to the distance traveled
拥有已储存的攻击能量时，攻击速度+30: ASPD +30 when there are stored attacks
拥有较大治疗范围，但在治疗较远目标时治疗量变为<@ba.kw>{heal_sca: Has a large healing range, but the healing amount on farther targets is reduced to <@ba.kw>{heal_scale:0%}</>
拥有较大治疗范围，治疗较远目标时治疗量<@ba.kw>不再降低</>: Has a large healing range and healing is <@ba.kw>no longer reduced</> for distant targets
撤退时返还<@ba.kw>大量</>该次部署费用: Refunds <@ba.kw>a large portion</> of the current DP Cost when retreated
操作<@ba.kw>浮游单元</>对敌人造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>\\n: Controls a <@ba.kw>Drone</> to deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage to an enemy; When the Drone continuously attacks the same enemy, its damage will increase (up to 110% of the operator's ATK)
操作<@ba.kw>浮游单元</>造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>\\n单元攻: Controls a <@ba.kw>Drone</> that deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>; When the Drone attacks the same enemy, its damage will increase (up to 110% of the operator's ATK)
攻击对小范围的<@ba.kw>地面</>敌人造成<@ba.kw>三次</>物理伤: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>three instances</> of Physical damage to <@ba.kw>ground</> enemies in a small area (The latter two instances are shockwaves that have half the normal ATK)
攻击对小范围的<@ba.kw>地面</>敌人造成<@ba.kw>两次</>物理伤: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>two instances</> of Physical damage to <@ba.kw>ground</> enemies in a small area (The second instance is a shockwave that has half the normal ATK)

Attacks deal Physical Damage <@ba.kw>twice</> to <@ba.kw>ground</> enemies in a small radius (second time is an aftershock dealing half ATK in damage), and ignores the <@ba.kw>Deployment Limit</>, but has a long Redeployment Time
攻击时需要消耗子弹且攻击力提升至<@ba.kw>120%</>，不攻击时会缓慢地: Attacks require ammo and ATK increases to <@ba.kw>120%</>; Reloads ammo gradually when not attacking (up to 8 ammo)
攻击时需要消耗子弹且攻击力提升至<@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</: Attacks require ammo and ATK increases to <@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</>; Reloads ammo gradually when not attacking (up to {value} ammo)
Attacks require ammo and ATK increases to <@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</>; Reloads ammo gradually when not attacking (up to {value} ammo, upgraded after reaching Elite 1)
Attacks require ammo and ATK increases to <@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</>; Reloads ammo gradually when not attacking (up to {value} ammo, upgraded after reaching Elite 2)
攻击正前方的敌人时攻击力提升至<@ba.kw>105%</>且无视其物理闪避: Increases ATK to <@ba.kw>105%</> when attacking enemies directly in front, and ignores their Physical Dodge
攻击生命值低于<@ba.vup>{hp_ratio:0%}</>的敌人时攻击力提: When attacking enemies with less than <@ba.vup>{hp_ratio:0%}</> of their max HP, increase ATK to <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</>
攻击的敌人未被击倒时自身额外获得<@ba.kw>{sp}</>点技力: If the attacked enemy remains alive, gain <@ba.kw>{sp}</> additional SP
攻击空中单位时攻击力提升至<@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</>: Increases ATK to <@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</> when attacking aerial targets
攻击范围内存在敌人时技力自然恢复速度+0.2/s: SP recovery +0.2/sec when there are enemies within range
攻击范围内所有敌人移动速度<@ba.kw>-20%</>: Slows the Movement Speed of enemies within this unit's attack range by <@ba.kw>20%</>
攻击范围内的<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>，对自己前方一横排的敌人攻击力提升至1: Attacks <@ba.kw>all enemies</> within range, and deals 150% damage to enemies in the row directly in front of this unit.
攻击被阻挡的敌人时攻击力提升至<@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</>: Increases ATK to <@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</> when attacking blocked enemies
攻击被阻挡的敌人时攻击力提升至<@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</: Increases ATK to <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> when attacking blocked enemies
攻击越远的敌人造成的伤害越高（最高提升<@ba.kw>{damage_scale: The further away the enemy, the higher the damage dealt (up to an increase of <@ba.kw>{damage_scale:0%}</>)
攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>\\n可以使用<@ba.kw>召唤物</>:
Deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>
Can use <@ba.kw>Summons</> in battles
攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，且会在<@ba.kw>3</>个敌人间跳: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage and jump between <@ba.kw>3</> enemies. Each jump deals 15% less damage and inflicts a brief <$ba.sluggish>Slow</>
攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，且会在<@ba.kw>{attack@c: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage and jump between <@ba.kw>{attack@chain.max_target}</> enemies. Each jump <@ba.kw>no longer deals less damage</> and inflicts a brief <$ba.sluggish>Slow</>
Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage and jump between <@ba.kw>{attack@chain.max_target}</> enemies. Each jump deals 15% less damage and inflicts a brief <$ba.sluggish>Slow</>
Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage and jump between <@ba.kw>{attack@chain.max_target}</> enemies. Each jump deals 15% less damage and inflicts a brief <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> (improved after Elite 2)
攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，且会在<@ba.kw>{attack@m: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage and jump between <@ba.kw>{attack@max_target}</> enemies. Each jump <@ba.kw>no longer deals less damage</> and inflicts a brief <$ba.sluggish>Slow</>
Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage and jump between <@ba.kw>{attack@max_target}</> enemies. Each jump deals 15% less damage and inflicts a brief <$ba.sluggish>Slow</>

Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage and jump between <@ba.kw>{attack@max_target}</> enemies. Each jump deals 15% less damage and inflicts a brief <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> (Upgraded after reaching Elite 2)
Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage and jump between <@ba.kw>{attack@max_target}</> enemies. Each jump deals <@ba.kw>{value:0%}</> less damage and inflicts a short <$ba.sluggish>Slow</>
攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，可以造成<@ba.kw>元素损伤</>: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts damage</> and can deal <@ba.kw>Elemental impairment</>
攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，在找不到攻击目标时可以将攻击能量<@ba: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>; When unable to find a target, attacks can be <@ba.kw>stored up</> and fired all at once (Up to 3 charges)
Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>; When unable to find a target, attacks can be <@ba.kw>stored up</> and fired all at once (Up to 4 charges)
攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，并对敌人造成<@ba.kw>较长</>的: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>, and <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> the enemy for a <@ba.kw>moderate</> period of time
攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，并对敌人造成短暂的<$ba.sluggi: Deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</> and <$ba.sluggish>Slows</> the target for a short time
攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，技能开启后改为治疗友方单位（治疗量相当于: Deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>; When skill is active, attacks instead restore the HP of allies (heal amount is equal to 75% of ATK)
Deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>; When skill is active, attacks instead restore the HP of allies (heal amount is equal to <@ba.kw>{heal_scale:0%}</> of ATK)
攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，攻击敌人时为攻击范围内一名友方干员治疗相: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage and heal the HP of an ally within Attack Range for <@ba.kw>{scale:0%}</> of the damage dealt
攻击造成<@ba.kw>超远距离的群体法术伤害</>: Deals <@ba.kw>AOE Arts damage in a long line</>
攻击造成<@ba.kw>超远距离的群体法术伤害</>，距离越远伤害越高，最高达到: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>extremely long-ranged AoE Arts damage</>; damage dealt increases with distance, up to <@ba.kw>110%</>
攻击造成法术伤害，攻击敌人时为攻击范围内一名友方干员治疗相当于50%伤害的生命值: Attacks deal Arts damage and heal the HP of an ally within Attack Range for 50% of the damage dealt
攻击重量较重（重量等级大于等于3）的敌人时，攻击力提升至<@ba.kw>115%: When attacking a heavy enemy (weight 3 or greater), ATK increased to <@ba.kw>115%</>
无法被友方角色治疗，攻击造成<@ba.kw>群体伤害</>，每攻击到一个敌人回复: Cannot be healed by allies; Attacks deal <@ba.kw>AoE damage</>; Recovers <@ba.kw>{value}</> HP for every enemy hit during attacks, up to Block count
Cannot be healed by allies; Attacks deal <@ba.kw>AoE damage</>; Recovers <@ba.kw>{value}</> HP for every enemy hit during attacks, up to Block count
普通攻击命中精英或领袖敌人时获得<@ba.kw>1</>点技力: Gain <@ba.kw>1</> SP when normal attacks hit an elite or leader enemy.
普通攻击命中精英或领袖敌人时获得<@ba.kw>{sp}</>点技力: Gain <@ba.kw>{sp}</> SP when normal attacks hit an elite or leader enemy.
有20%概率部署造成2倍伤害的陷阱: Has 20% chance to deploy traps that deal twice the damage
治疗地面单位时治疗量提升<@ba.kw>15%</>: Healing increased by <@ba.kw>15%</> when healing a ground unit
治疗生命值低于50%的友方单位时治疗量提升<@ba.kw>15%</>: When healing allied units with less than 50% HP, increases heal amount by <@ba.kw>15%</>
生命值高于50%时受到的物理伤害降低<@ba.kw>{damage_resist: Reduce Physical damage taken by <@ba.kw>{damage_resistance:0%}</> when HP is above 50%
生命值高于80%时，技力自然回复速度+0.25/秒: Gain SP recovery +0.25/sec when HP is above 80%
缓慢回复技力，只有阻挡敌人时恢复技力回复速度: SP recovery is slowed except when blocking enemies
能够阻挡一个敌人，且不受<@ba.kw>部署数量</>限制，但再部署时间极长: Blocks 1 enemy and ignores the <@ba.kw>Deployment Limit</>, but has a long Redeployment Time
能够阻挡三个敌人，且不受<@ba.kw>部署数量</>限制，但再部署时间极长: Blocks 3 enemies and ignores the <@ba.kw>Deployment Limit</>, but has a long Redeployment Time
能够阻挡三个敌人，可以进行远程攻击: Blocks 3 enemies and attacks from long range.
能够阻挡两个敌人，使用<支援装置>协助作战: Blocks 2 enemies; Can use <Support Devices> in battles
能够阻挡两个敌人，阻挡敌人时攻击力和防御力各+8％: Blocks 2 enemies; Gains +8% ATK and DEF while blocking enemies
自身获得<$ba.buffres>抵抗</>且更不容易受到敌人的攻击: Gain <$ba.buffres>status resistance</>, and become less likely to be attacked
范围内存在地面敌人时攻击速度<@ba.kw>+8</>: When there are ground enemies within range, ASPD <@ba.kw>+8</>
被击倒时不撤退且回复<@ba.kw>{hp_ratio:0%}</>生命（单次部: When defeated, does not retreat and recovers <@ba.kw>{hp_ratio:0%}</> HP instead (Can only activate once every deployment)
被击倒时不撤退且回复所有生命但生命上限<@ba.vdown>-{value:0%: When defeated, does not retreat and recovers all HP instead. However, Max HP <@ba.vdown>-{value:0%}</> and ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</> (Can only activate once every deployment)
通常不攻击且阻挡数为0，技能未开启时<@ba.kw>{max_stack_cnt: Normally does not attack and has 0 Block; When skill is inactive, ATK gradually increases up to <@ba.kw>+{atk:0%}</> over <@ba.kw>{max_stack_cnt}</> seconds. ATK is reset when the skill ends
